## Summary
Provide a brief overview of what this pull request does.  
Example: *"Add new lexer functionality to more safely and efficiently handle floating-point literals."*

## Changes
- List key changes made in this PR
- Include any new files or modules added
- Note any important modifications to existing code, and how this could possibly effect future development. 

## Motivation
Why are these changes needed? What problem do they solve?

## Checklist
- [ ] Code compiles successfully
- [ ] Tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Code follows style guidelines
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Relevant issues linked (e.g., closes #123)

## Additional Information
Any other context, screenshots, or references that may help reviewer(s).
